source: Trump son-in-law Kushner denies Russia collusion, president lashes out. Jared Kushner, President Donald Trump's son-in-law and a senior White House adviser, said on Monday he "did not collude" with Russia and had roughly four meetings with Russian officials during the 2016 campaign and presidential transition.
Read Jared Kushner’s Statement On His Meetings With Russians. “I did not collude,” he tells congressional committees.

Jared Kushner denies collusion in statement ahead of Capitol Hill testimony. Jared Kushner, a senior White House adviser and President Trump’s son-in-law, denied any collusion with the Russian government in a statement Monday ahead of his testimony on Capitol Hill.
target: Kushner Denies Russia Collusion. Jared Kushner, a senior White House adviser and President Trump’s son-in-law, denied any collusion with the Russian government in a statement Monday ahead of his testimony on Capitol Hill.
